Package com.techietag.springaiagent.service

Class IngestionService

java.lang.Object
com.techietag.springaiagent.service.IngestionService
@Service public class IngestionService extends Object
Service responsible for ingesting documents (PDFs) into a configured VectorStore and performing simple verification/search operations against the ingested data.

Responsibilities: - Load a PDF resource from the classpath (or other ResourceLoader-backed location). - Chunk the PDF into document pages using PagePdfDocumentReader. - Add the resulting Document objects to the provided VectorStore. - Provide a small verification method that runs a similarity search and returns high-confidence matches as a single concatenated string. Notes: - The concrete VectorStore implementation (for example a Redis-backed vector store) is provided by Spring (auto-configured elsewhere) and injected into this service. - This class is intentionally simple for demo/POC usage and can be extended to return richer status objects, async ingestion, progress reporting, and error handling.

  • Method Details

    • ingestPDF

      public String ingestPDF(String fileName)
      Ingests the specified PDF (by filename) into the configured vector store. The method will: 1. Resolve the requested file from classpath:/docs/ by provided filename. 2. If the file exists, chunk it into page-level Document instances using PagePdfDocumentReader and add them to the VectorStore. 3. Return a short human-friendly status string. Behavior/edge-cases: - If fileName is null/empty, a default filename is used. - If the resource does not exist the method logs and returns "File Not Found". - This method performs ingestion synchronously and blocks until vectorStore.add(...) completes.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file in classpath:/docs/ to ingest (for example "Flexora_FAQ.pdf")
      Returns:
      a short status message indicating success or failure

    • verifyIngestedData

      public String verifyIngestedData(String query)
      Performs a similarity search against the vector store using the provided query and returns a concatenated text of highly confident matches. Implementation details: - Calls VectorStoreRetriever.similaritySearch(String) to get candidate documents. - Filters out nulls and documents with a score is less than 0.8 (confidence threshold). - Returns the concatenated text of matching documents separated by newlines.
      Parameters:
      query - the natural language query used for similarity search
      Returns:
      concatenated high-confidence match texts (or empty string when none match)
